alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 10 at 8:55PM CST until February 11 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Cook County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle is possible at times this evening into the overnight and may add a glaze of ice to surfaces. Visibility may be less than one-half mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
